channel.title: Rachel Hallie Art
channel.description: Recent content on Rachel Hallie Art

item.title: Contact/Comission
item.description: If you’re interested in an art or design commission, or would like to enquire about buying a work, feel free to contact me at the following addresses: Phone: 703-232-9698 Email: rachel@rachelhallieart.com

item.title: About the Artist
item.description: Rachel Hallie Pehrsson is an undergraduate at the University of Virginia, majoring in Studio Art with a concentration in painting and Computer Science. She specializes in acrylic and watercolor painting, with additional experience in digital art and design. She has done marketing design work at the Naval Research Laboratory in Washington DC, as well as for her clubs at UVA.

item.title: Design and Animaton
item.description: .hvrbox, .hvrbox * { box-sizing: border-box; } .hvrbox { position: relative; display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; max-width: 49%; height: auto; } .hvrbox img { max-width: 100%; max-height: 100%; } .hvrbox .hvrbox-layer_bottom { display: block; } .hvrbox .hvrbox-layer_top { opacity: 0; position: absolute; top: 0; left: 0; right: 0; bottom: 0; width: 100%; height: 100%; background: #2E86C1; color: #fff; padding: 15px; -moz-transition: all 0.4s ease-in-out 0s; -webkit-transition: all 0.4s ease-in-out 0s; -ms-transition: all 0.

item.title: Paintings and Drawings
item.description: 2017 1 / 3 -- Indhu, Acrylic Ink on Canvas 1 / 3 -- The Lounge Singer, Acrylic Ink on Canvas 1 / 3 -- Pi and Krishna, Acrylic Ink on Canvas 1 / 3 -- Boxed Intergalactic, Oil on Canvas 2 / 3 -- Self Portrait Blue, Oil on Canvas 2016 3 / 3 -- Noir, Oil on Paper

item.title: Welcome
item.description: Welcome to my new website, where I will post and document my art! Feel free to contact me if you are interested in comission or purchase.
